code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import debug from"sabio-debug";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var _logger=debug.extend("Category");function Category(props){var aCategory=props.category;_logger(props.category);var navigate=useNavigate();var onCategoryClicked=function onCategoryClicked(){_logger("view category",aCategory);var state={type:"PERSON_VIEW",payload:aCategory};navigate("/category/".concat(aCategory.id),{state:state});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:aCategory.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:aCategory.id,className:"link-btn btn btn-danger",onClick:onCategoryClicked,children:"View"})]})})});}export default Category;
